- **Reviewers**:
- **Target Milestone**:
- **Status**: Draft | In Review | Approved

## 1. Summary
- One-paragraph overview of the feature, user value, and success criteria.

## 2. Requirements
- Functional requirements and edge cases.
- Non-functional requirements (performance, accessibility, localization).

## 3. Architecture & Design
- High-level flow diagrams or references to existing components.
- Data contracts, APIs, extension points affected.

## 4. User Experience
- UX flows, mockups, and interaction notes.
- Accessibility considerations.

## 5. Risks & Open Questions
- Identified technical or product risks.
- Outstanding decisions and owners.

## 6. Validation & Rollout
- Test strategy (unit, integration, performance, UX).
- Telemetry/metrics required, rollout plan, fallback strategy.
